name: Bravo Studio Blocks - Recipe App
description:
Feel free to duplicate and try out this recipe app blocks bundle with the Bravo Studio app! 

Use these Bravo Blocks to test a real native app or use the templates to build your own and connect it with real, live data!

Hope you like it! 🎉

--

With Bravo Blocks, designing apps just got a WHOLE lot easier with ready-made intro pages, menus, containers, top bars and more 🤓

Check out Bravo Studio App 👏
www.bravostudio.app
